message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.MM, cs.AI 

This paper discusses the development of a recommendation system for Cable TV, which involves the use of machine learning algorithms to improve user satisfaction with Live TV, Video on Demand, and Catch-up TV services. The paper focuses on a learning to rank approach that uses contextual information and implicit feedback to enhance the accuracy of the recommendation system. Given the focus on machine learning and information retrieval, as well as the use of implicit feedback, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Other likely sub-categories include cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
